message.content:
To extract the specific line item and value of costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver the goods and services to customers, we will focus on the "income statement" section of the provided financial statements.

In analyzing the income statement provided:

```markdown
| Account                        | Amount      | Date       |
| ------------------------------ | ----------- | ---------- |
| Main Business Revenue          | 547392.30   | 2024-02-05 |
| Total Revenue                  | 547392.30   | 2024-02-05 |
| Cost of Goods Sold             | 353220.00   | 2024-02-05 |
| Total Cost                     | 353220.00   | 2024-02-05 |
| Gross Profit                   | 194172.30   | 2024-02-05 |
| Administrative Expenses         | 11762.87    | 2024-02-05 |
| Selling Expenses                | 14714.68    | 2024-02-05 |
| Depreciation                   | 91488.35    | 2024-02-05 |
| Financial Expenses              | 2220.62     | 2024-02-05 |
| Total Expenses                  | 120186.52   | 2024-02-05 |
| Interest Income                 | 9881.70     | 2024-02-05 |
| Profit Before Tax              | 83867.48    | 2024-02-05 |
| Tax Expense                    | 27369.63    | 2024-02-05 |
| Net Profit                     | 56497.85    | 2024-02-05 |
```

From the details in the income statement, the relevant line item that corresponds to the costs incurred to secure customer orders and deliver goods and services is the "Cost of Goods Sold," along with associated selling expenses. 

The value of the "Cost of Goods Sold" is **353220.00**. The "Selling Expenses" item, which also reflects costs related to selling activities, is specifically noted as **14714.68**.

However, the Costs of Goods Sold directly reflects the cost incurred for the production or procurement of the goods sold to customers.

Thus, the most relevant line item to present is:

- Cost of Goods Sold: **353220.00**

In summary, the main value extracted is **353220.00**, which reflects the costs incurred to deliver the goods and services to customers.

Putting this in the required JSON format:

```json
{"solution": {'value': '353220.00'} }
```
